about.title: About me
about.intro1: With a background in media design and an eye for structure and aesthetics, I develop web applications that are technically sound and visually clear.
about.intro2: I love the combination of code and design: clean HTML/CSS, performant Angular architectures, and a UI that feels intuitive and cohesive for users.
about.intro3: What drives me is the idea of turning complexity into simple and elegant solutions.
slogans: “Clean code isn't a luxury – it's a responsibility.”
“Frontend is more than tech – it’s user relationship.”
“Frontend isn't a click-goal – it’s a system interface.”
“The user doesn’t see it. But the next developer will.”
“My stack? HTML, CSS, TypeScript – and a pinch of intuition.”
“Data flows, layouts follow – the rest is focus.”

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.subtitle: Information according to §5 TMG
imprint.name: Jonathan Michutta
imprint.responsibleHeader: Responsible for content according to §55 Abs.2 RStV:
imprint.copyrightText: All content on this website (texts, images, graphics, logo, and code) is subject to German copyright law. Reproduction, editing, distribution, or use beyond the scope of copyright law requires written permission from the creator. Downloads and copies of this site are permitted only for private, non-commercial use.
imprint.liabilityText: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages according to §7 Abs.1 TMG and general laws. According to §§8 to 10 TMG, I am not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or investigate circumstances indicating illegal activity. Upon becoming aware of such violations, I will remove the content immediately.
imprint.designText:
Jonathan Michutta
All design elements of this website – especially logo, structure, and UI style – were independently designed and implemented.
imprint.iconNote:
Note on icons:
Some of the icons used are based on templates provided during my training at the Development Academy. They are used solely to illustrate the technologies and are not intended for commercial use or trademark representation.

privacy.headline: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy informs you about the type, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data (hereinafter referred to as "data") within our online offering and the associated websites, functions and content.

access.title: Access Data
access.intro: When visiting this website, the following data is automatically collected:
access.date: Date and time of the request

privacy.usage: This data is used exclusively to ensure the secure operation of the site and for statistical evaluation. No combination with other data sources takes place.
privacy.contact:
If you contact me via form, your data (e.g. name, email address, message) will be stored for the purpose of processing your request. This data will not be passed on without your consent.

The processing is based on your consent according to Art. 6 (1) lit. a GDPR. You can revoke this consent at any time, for example by email.
privacy.honeypot: To protect against automated spam entries, I use a so-called honeypot field. This field is invisible to regular visitors and is often automatically filled in by bots. Such submissions are automatically discarded and not stored.
privacy.deletion: The data is used exclusively to process your message and will be deleted afterward, unless legal retention obligations exist.

cookies.title: Cookies:
cookies.text: This website does not use cookies that require user consent.

legal.title: Legal Basis of Processing:
legal.text: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in the secure provision of the website) and Art. 6 (1) lit. a GDPR (consent, e.g. for the contact form).

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Request information about your stored data (Art. 15 GDPR)
rights.correction: Request correction of inaccurate data (Art. 16 GDPR)
rights.deletion: Request deletion or restriction of processing (Art. 17 & 18 GDPR)
rights.complaint: File a complaint with a supervisory authority

storage.title: Storage Duration:
storage.text: Personal data is stored only as long as necessary for the respective purpose or if legal retention obligations apply. I reserve the right to change this privacy policy if necessary to reflect changes in the law or in the online offering.

contact.title: Contact
contact.introText:
I’m happy to receive inquiries – just tell me which area you need support in.
Show me your project – and I’ll show you how I can create real value with clean code.

Looking for a Frontend Developer?
Get in touch!
contact.emailError: Please enter a valid email address.
contact.privacyTextEnd: and I agree to the data processing described therein.
contact.formDescription: Contact form to send a message. All fields are required.

tools.headline: Skills
tools.textBox1:
I work with modern frontend technologies to build performant, structured, and maintainable applications.

My focus lies on clean code, modular architecture, and a UI that feels intuitive.

I'm open to new technologies and regularly expand my knowledge – because good web development means thinking along, growing along, and helping shape the future.
tools.missingText: Feel free to reach out – I'm always happy to expand my skillset.

patrick.text: Jon was always fully committed and open to any task. What I especially appreciated was how versatile he contributed – it made the collaboration not only productive but also very pleasant. The exchange was always open, warm, and collegial.

stephanie.text: Jonathan was a very pleasant teammate who brought great stability to the team with his calm and structured manner. His strengths were especially in UI design, CSS, and Angular logic. I particularly valued how he always thought ahead and could clearly communicate technical contexts.

jennifer.text: Jonathan was fully integrated from the start and fit into the team both professionally and personally. The collaboration was easy, productive, and characterized by mutual appreciation. I was especially impressed by how quickly he dove into complex topics while staying calm at all times.

ha.text: Jon proved to be independent, committed, and solution-oriented. His media skills and creative approach significantly enriched the design and user experience of the project. With his positive attitude and dedication, he was truly an asset to the team.

taher.text: I had the pleasure of working with Jonathan on a website project and was impressed by his enthusiasm for coding. He quickly understood new concepts and purposefully integrated them into the project. Calm, focused, and always aiming to find good solutions together.

join.title: Join
join.dialogDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks via drag & drop, assign users and categories.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.dialogDescription: Interactive Pokédex app with live API data. Displays names, types and images – filterable and searchable.

elpollo.title: El Pollo Loco
elpollo.dialogDescription: Jump, run and throw game with object-oriented programming. Help Pepe collect coins and hot sauce to defeat the crazy chicken.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.dialogDescription: Personal portfolio focused on UI design and smooth animations. Structure, style and motion ensure a clear user experience.
